> R = s / √3

Actually, for an equilateral triangle:

- Centroid (which coincides with circumcenter in equilateral triangle) is located at 2/3 of the height from a vertex.

So, circumradius R = (2/3) * h = (2/3) * (√3 / 2) * s = (√3 / 3) * s = s / √3

✅ So, R = s / √3
